steps: remove the line with ReactDom.render and add the following to index.js ReactDOM.render(<BrowserRouter><App /></BrowserRouter>,document.getElementById('root'));
in App.js add <Link> component and import it
syntax of using Link component <Link to=AddTheUrlPathWithQuotes>Home</Link>
add <Switch> and <Route> components and import them
the Switch wraps all the Route's components, in other words, Switch is a parent of all Route components
the Route should include path=UrlPath and a render that will render the component you want

new syntax: <Switch>inside of here you'll have multiple <Route> components</Switch>
